content.text:
# List of honours of Brazil awarded to heads of state and royalty

This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honorific orders or similar decorations awarded by Brazil, classified by Monarchies chapter and Republics chapter, and, under each chapter, recipients' countries and the detailed list of recipients.
Awards
Monarchies
European
Denmark
*King Frederik X of Denmark:
**Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (22 January 1997)
**Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (30 June 1999)
*Queen Mary of Denmark: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 September 2007)
*Queen Margrethe II: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (30 June 1999)
*Prince Joachim of Denmark: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 September 2007)
Netherlands
*King Willem-Alexander of the Netherlands: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (18 March 2003)
*Queen Máxima of the Netherlands: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (18 March 2003)
*Princess Beatrix of the Netherlands, former Queen: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (18 March 2003)
*Princess Margriet of the Netherlands: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 April 2008)
*Pieter van Vollenhoven, her husband: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 April 2008)
Luxembourg
*Henri, Grand Duke of Luxembourg: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (3 December 2007)
*Maria Teresa, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (3 December 2007)
Monaco
*Princess Caroline of Monaco: Grand Officer of the Order of Rio Branco (1 December 2022)
Norway
*King Harald V of Norway:
**Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (6 October 2003)
**Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (3 March 1964)
*Queen Sonja of Norway: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (6 October 2003)
*Prince Haakon, Crown Prince of Norway: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 September 2007)
*Princess Mette-Marit, Crown Princess of Norway: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 September 2007)
Spain
*King Felipe VI of Spain: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (4 December 1991)
*Juan Carlos I of Spain, former King: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (16 May 1983)
*Queen Sofía of Spain: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (16 May 1983)
*Infanta Elena, Duchess of Lugo: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (2 May 1984)
*Infanta Cristina of Spain: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (2 May 1984)
Sweden
*King Carl XVI Gustaf of Sweden: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 April 1984)
*Queen Silvia of Sweden: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 April 1984)
*Princess Victoria, Crown Princess of Sweden: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 September 2007)
*Prince Carl Philip, Duke of Värmland: Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (5 September 2007)
*Princess Madeleine, Duchess of Hälsingland and Gästrikland: Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (5 September 2007)
African
Morocco
*King Mohammed VI of Morocco:
**Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (29 November 2004)
**Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 May 1984)
*Prince Moulay Rachid of Morocco: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 May 1984)
Asian
Bahrain
*King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (11 November 2021)
Japan
*Emperor Naruhito: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
*Empress Masako: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
*Empress Michiko, Empress Emerita: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
*Prince Fumihito, Crown Prince of Japan: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
*Princess Kiko, Crown Princess of Japan: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
*Sayako Kuroda, former Princess: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (23 May 1996)
Qatar
*Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (19 November 2021)
United Arab Emirates
*President Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, also Ruler of Abu Dhabi: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (11 November 2021)
*Vice President Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, also Ruler of Dubai: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (11 November 2021)
Republics
Argentina
*Eduardo Duhalde, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (14 October 2002)
*Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (16 July 2015)
*Mauricio Macri, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (2 February 2017)
*Alberto Fernández, former President:
**Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (6 July 2023)
**Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (26 November 2003)
*Fabiola Yáñez, his partner: Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (6 July 2023)
Bolivia
*Jorge Quiroga, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 February 2002)
*Evo Morales, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (14 December 2007)
Bulgaria
*Rosen Plevneliev, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (1 February 2016)
Cape Verde
*Jorge Carlos Fonseca, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (27 July 2021)
Chile
*Ricardo Lagos, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (19 July 2000)
*Michelle Bachelet, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (12 April 2006)
Colombia
*Álvaro Uribe, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (16 September 2009)
*Juan Manuel Santos, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (1 September 2010)
*Iván Duque, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (15 October 2021)
Costa Rica
*Miguel Ángel Rodríguez, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (3 July 2000)
East Timor
*Xanana Gusmão, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (19 August 2002)
El Salvador
*Mauricio Funes, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 March 2010)
Finland
*Eeva Ahtisaari, widow of Martti Ahtisaari: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (24 March 1997)
France
*President Emmanuel Macron:
**Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (28 March 2024)
**Grand Officer of the Order of the Southern Cross (9 December 2012)
*Nicolas Sarkozy, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (14 September 2009)
*François Hollande, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (9 December 2012)
Germany
*Horst Köhler, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (19 March 2007)
Israel
*Michal Herzog, wife of Isaac Herzog: Grand Cross of the Order of Rio Branco (1 December 2022)
Italy
*Clio Maria Bittoni, wife of Giorgio Napolitano: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (18 November 2008)
Lebanon
*Michel Suleiman, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (26 April 2010)
Mexico
*Ernesto Zedillo, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (22 July 1996)
*Vicente Fox, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (8 July 2002)
*Felipe Calderón, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (14 August 2007)
*Enrique Peña Nieto, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (11 December 2015)
Namibia
*Sam Nujoma, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (22 October 1999)
Nicaragua
*Violeta Chamorro, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (7 April 1992)
Panama
*Mireya Moscoso, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (17 October 2002)
Paraguay
*Juan Carlos Wasmosy, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (6 September 1994)
*Luis Ángel González Macchi, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (3 July 2000)
*Nicanor Duarte, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (31 May 2007)
*Horacio Cartes, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (21 August 2017)
Peru
*Ollanta Humala, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (10 December 2013)
Poland
*Aleksander Kwaśniewski, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (17 April 2002)
Portugal
*President Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (26 May 2023)
*Aníbal Cavaco Silva, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 March 2008)
*Maria Cavaco Silva, his wife: Grand Cross of the Order of the Southern Cross (5 March 2008)
South Africa
*Thabo Mbeki, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (8 January 2001)
Suriname
*Ronald Venetiaan, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (22 February 1996)
Syria
*President Bashar al-Assad: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (12 July 2010)
Ukraine
*Viktor Yushchenko, former President: Grand Collar of the Order of the Southern Cross (9 December 2009)
References
